text: [Music]
once upon a time in a little village in
China there was an old lady called mrs.
Zhao she was a kind woman
and although poor never grumbled about
the life she led ah it's really warm
today and the fruits look like they
should be ripe by the time my husband
comes home
mr. Zhao worked in towns far away and
couldn't come home to visit his wife so
easily he worked hard to earn for the
both of them one day a messenger came
and brought mrs. Gao a letter from her
husband
hello mrs. Zhao I hope you're doing good
here's a letter from mr. Zhao oh thank
you she went inside and opened up the
letter oh he'll be coming home soon and
he'll be getting double the pay for
working so hard such good news
especially since the rations in the
house are getting over mrs. Zhao awaited
his arrival with much excitement one day
she went out to pick the fruits and get
them ready for him but she stopped short
when she saw they were spoiled Oh No
how did this happen now I don't have
much to eat in the house mrs. Zhao lived
on the fruits she had picked and the few
which hadn't got spoiled but they were
soon over just a few more days and he'll
be here oh I'm so hungry mr. Zhao had
already reached the village and was
walking home happily thinking about his
lovely wife
My dear wife will be so happy to see me
and then I'll show her the silver yon
poll that I've got as he walked by he
saw a woman sitting sadly by the road
whom he seemed to recognize oh it's mrs.
Li I wonder why she's sitting there he
went up to mrs. Li and was startled to
see her crying mrs. Li why are you here
and why are you crying so bitterly I
don't have any money we've had no food
for days and I can't pay my rent the
landlord is threatening to throw me and
my daughter out mrs. Lee's husband
worked in the same town as mr. Zhao but
he hadn't any news of the man well you
know your husband works with me right
[Music]
did he send any letters from you telling
me when he'll come um no but he did send
me his salary to give to you here you go
[Music]
mrs. Li looked up eagerly It was as if a
miracle had happened thank you thank you
so much her eyes now sparkled and mr.
Zhao felt a warm glow within himself he
smiled as he watched her run off
know how do I explain this to my love he
continued on home and soon reached there
as he went in his wife screamed in
surprise and ran to hug him yoho-o
darling
mr. Zhao looked at his wife and realized
she looked a bit pale he asked her what
had happened to which she explained the
whole situation at home there's nothing
left except for a small handful of rice
didn't you get a good salary this time I
did but I gave it away
what to whom mr. Zhao told her
everything that he had done on the way
back I'm sorry my love but I couldn't
just leave her in tears it's all right
dear I know you meant well I'll make us
some rice porridge tonight we'll think
about everything tomorrow
mr. Zhao watched his wife slowly and
quietly eat her porridge she smiled as
she spoke to him but he knew she was sad
at evening as they slept he wondered
what he could do he suddenly remembered
the sweet potatoes that he had been
growing in mrs. Yang's field but that
would be stealing I can't do that but as
he looked at his wife he made up his
mind to take a few sweet potatoes he
would definitely pay them back later
so he got up and went to the field that
night mrs. yang had told her son Tao to
guard the field
ah it's so cold and boring here it's
worn in the little shade I'll go there
and so he walked to the shade and
cuddled up near the flames but a little
while later he heard a slight shuffling
sound huh it's my teacher mr. Joe why is
he here
mr. Zhao sat with his eyes closed
he was very stressed is it fine if I
take a few of mrs. yang sweet potatoes
it's only to feed us for a little while
until I can pay them back Tao watch
surprised and listened to his old
teacher who spoke so sadly he decided to
help the poor man oh great spirit you
are a kind man and I think well it's
fine if you take a few potatoes from the
field Oh
but is it not stealing of course not
if you're going to pay him back then
it's oh thank you great spirit Tao
watched him leave and decided to follow
and help mr. zhao mr. zhao was not at
all knowledgeable about digging up sweet
potatoes and was having a hard time
finding good ones go to the eastern end
of the field there you will find good
potatoes and so greatly astonished at
his good luck went over and dug up a
whole load of nice big sweet potatoes he
thanked the spirit greatly and why
home that was fun I better go home now
the next morning Tao told his mother
everything who was most surprised at
this sudden news
poor mr. Chou he must have had a tough
time let's go over to his place today
okay
mr. yang really liked the good mr. Zhao
and so decided to take him more sweet
potatoes along with some good warm food
when they reached there they heard mr.
Zhao talking this stew is delicious
isn't it honey
extremely my dear here have some more
mother they had good food all along why
did they have to steal from the field
then tell come here Tao looked through
the window and saw that there was no
stew it all on the table the old couple
were pretending that this simple sweet
potatoes were grand food the things one
must do to feel happy come tell mr. Zhao
mrs. Zhao hearing their voices guilt
flowed through the couple no let's just
be honest we can tell them we will pay
them back my dear and so they nervously
opened the door good morning Tao and I
came to but she hardly got through her
sentence when mr. Zhao confessed
everything he had done the night before
I promise I'll pay you for whatever I've
taken mr. Zhao I already know what you
did she explained the whole incident as
Tao tried hard not to giggle at mr. Zhao
is shocked face you don't have to worry
about pay me back here take these
baskets of food for you think of it as
just times
I don't know how to thank you
just then mrs. Li walked in with her
daughter she came up to thank mr. Zhao
for what he had done we are safe and
have a home because of you thank you for
passing on my husband's salary to us my
salary
they all turn to see mr. Li standing
there at the door he had seen his wife
enter the house from afar and had now
heard them talk what are you talking
about my salary form I have it right
here with me at this his wife gate she
was now as baffled as her husband mr.
Zhao smiled and explained what he had
done to the Li family now what was mr.
Lee's turn to gape he thanked mr. Zhao
profusely it's alright I was happy to
help
mr. Zhao smiled happily at everything
that had happened over the last few days
because he had been generous and kind it
had only come back to save him so always
remember to be kind no matter what as
they say what goes around always comes
around
[Music]
